ygData.subject: RE: Mistmoore Castle
ygData.msgSnippet: I am posting this as I need some info/help to obtain the Gypsy Lute for the Lambent BP Quest. Last night me (35 bard), 50 monk, 40 Mage, 35 Druid and 35
ygData.messageBody:
I am posting this as I need some info/help to obtain the Gypsy Lute for the
Lambent BP Quest.

Last night me (35 bard), 50 monk, 40 Mage, 35 Druid and 35 Paladin made our
way to the music room by having the monk pull, he could pull things solo,
we eventually held the music/piano room, that was until the monk pulled
about 10 things.

I somehow managed to run from the music room and make it to the zone with
about 20 hp's left. The Paladin died the monk FD'd and the casters gated.
Druid failed the evac as he was getting a beating.

I had to go after this and never got the chance to get a lute, although I
got the black silk gloves (in case you don't know, I am getting a friend
full Lambent in return for a Yak). All I need to know is was I in the right
place to get the lute, who drops it and is it a rare drop?

Many Thanks

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan
